Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., answers questions as he meets with constituents during a town hall meeting in Pendleton, Ind., on Friday. Mike Pence announced Thursday that he will not seek the presidency in 2012. Whether that's continuing to serve in Congress or coming home and running for governor, we're just going to take a hard look to see where we can make the most difference for the values we believe, he said.
